action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a neatly made bed with white linens in a room. There are two identical nightstands on either side of the bed, each with a lamp and a phone. Above the bed, there are three abstract paintings on the wall. The room has a wooden floor and white walls.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a bedroom with a large, ornate wooden bed featuring a patterned comforter and multiple pillows. There are two nightstands on either side of the bed, each with a lamp. The wall behind the bed has a framed picture hanging on it. The room has a carpeted floor and a plain wall.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows a neatly made bed with white linens in a room. There are two identical nightstands on either side of the bed, each with a lamp and a phone. Above the bed, there are three abstract paintings on the wall. The room has a wooden floor and white walls.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the color of the linens on the bed in your image?
